title: Leona Rework
body:
So i had an idea for a possible leona rework that may add a bit more counterplay, but at the same time, give leona the possibility for more impactful results

For her passive, whenever she damages an enemy, she applies a debuff on them. This debuff may last however long is balanced, and doesnt do anything until activated by her w. More of that later

Her q is a slow no instead of a stun, the numbers are whatever seems balanced

Jer W is the same, but instead of dealing damage at the end, it applies an aoe slow to those hit, the slow is like 10% or something really small. However, if the w hits an enemy with her passive applied, it will stun them instead. This will allow you to have more counterplay. This brings in allot of counterplay opportunities, but also allot of devastation from leona, because if she applies stacks on multiple people, and gets them both with the W, she will stun more people

Her E is the exact same, but also apploes her passive 

Her ulti is also the same, but if she hits enemies that are already stunned, the ult stun length will be rediced by half (similar to kennens stun), but the enemy will instead be slowed afterwards for an extra second and/or take extra damage

This rework i thought of will allow Leona to be a sloghtly more diverse champion, offering more rewards the better you play her, rather than getting instastunned, followed by another stun and a slow. The basic leona combo would be w, wait until it is about to explode, and then e onto the enemy (from a bush maybe). If done correctly, the e will apply a stack and if timed correctly, the w will then stun them. You could then q them after for a slow. At the same time, if your an enemy, you could back off when she activates w, and if she comes out of nowhere, you cant be instastunned, allowing for a very small opportunity to flash/dash away. Also, taking away jer passive and w damage in tjis rework, and instead replacing them with these playmaking/cc abilities would make her feel like more of a support, and would stop her doing more damage than her ad carry pre lvl 6

Just an idea, if you like it then upvote so riot can see. If you have any ideas to expand on mine, tell me below!

replies.body:
>So i had an idea for a possible leona rework that may add a bit more counterplay

Wait, leona needs more counterplay?

I mean i'm not even going to read the rest of this, because it's like you don't understand how much counterplay to leona their already is.

Don't catch her E, move out of her long ass cast time ult, and she can't get near you because you can kite her.
And if you read on, it also gives her more opportunities for more impactful plays

She is fine how she is, if the leona is good, she has massively impactful plays, i read it and it's just a terrible change to a balanced champion.

She has impactful plays, and she is a really good support if you're good with her (just don't use my leona as evidence for this)

She also has a buttload of counterplay built in, like i feel you picked something like Ashe into her, and are wondering why she dumpstered you when Leona counters immobility massively.
idk im just trying to find a way to make her kit more or less, deep. Like, make her abilities have more synergy with each other

Why do they need to have synergy?

They fit together really well already, you E in to get in range of your Q with your W active because it gives you tankiness to survive the hits you will take because you're in range of the enemies.

Changing it so her W is the stun would just be a mixture of OP (against low mobilty) and underpowered as fuck (because flash is a thing, and this is league of mobility.)

Yeah thats my point. If you play her right, it could be devastating, but also weak as shit. And remember, her w would pnly stun if the enemy had her passive on them. So most of the time, unless your awesome, it would only stun one person. Besides its just an idea, its not like rioters actually get ideas of these forums lol
